title: Not signed up - club interest
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a user is a Prospect
AND user has received the first invitation from a club
AND user has not yet signed up on DP
AND other clubs have expressed interest
custom_expected:
THEN DP system automatically sends user a Reminder With New Club Interest email 
AND the frequency of this automatic email is once a week for one month
AND after the first month, the frequency is once a month for one year
AND email includes the linkID used in the first invitation
AND email lists all clubs that expressed interest.

title: Not signed up - no club interest
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a user is a Prospect
AND user has received the first invitation from a club
AND user has not yet signed up on DP
AND no other clubs have expressed interest
custom_expected:
THEN DP system automatically sends user a Reminder No New Club Interest email 
AND the frequency of this automatic email is once a week for one month
AND after the first month, the frequency is once a month for one year
AND email includes the linkID used in the first invitation.

[In the image below, the black rectangle is the DP logo.]

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19570)

title: Signed up - club interest - tasks complete
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a user is a Prospect
AND user has received the first invitation from a club
AND user signed up on DP
AND other clubs have expressed interest
AND user has completed all tasks
custom_expected:
THEN DP system automatically sends user an email 
AND the frequency of automatic emails is once a week
AND email lists only those clubs that expressed interest in the past week.

title: Signed up - club interest - tasks undone
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a user is a Prospect
AND user has received the first invitation from a club
AND user signed up on DP
AND other clubs have expressed interest
AND user has not completed all tasks
custom_expected:
THEN DP system automatically sends user an email 
AND the frequency of automatic emails is once a week
AND email lists only those clubs that expressed interest in the past week
AND email includes a reminder to complete tasks.

[In image below, black rectangle is DP logo.]

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19569)

title: Signed up - no club interest - tasks undone
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a user is a Prospect
AND user has received the first invitation from a club
AND user signed up on DP
AND no other clubs have expressed interest
AND user has not completed all tasks
custom_expected:
THEN DP system automatically sends user an email 
AND the frequency of automatic emails is once a week
AND email includes a reminder to complete tasks.

title: Signed up - no club interest - tasks complete
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a user is a Prospect
AND user has received the first invitation from a club
AND user signed up on DP
AND no other clubs have expressed interest
AND user has completed all tasks
custom_expected: THEN DP system does not send user a weekly email.

title: QUESTIONS: System warns about dupe Prospects
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is entering information to send an invite to a Prospect
custom_steps:
WHEN system compares first name, last name, DOB? to database of Prospects? or invites already sent?
AND system identifies a possible dupe
custom_expected:
THEN system warns user that Prospect is already in the system
AND system disables invite to that Prospect?
AND system does not tell user who entered Prospect in the system?

A Club cannot send a 2nd invite to the same Prospect.
A Club cannot send an invite to a Prospect who already received an invite from another Club. -- BUT we don't want a Scout to know this, right? So Scout has to think invite was sent?

title: Scout sends invite: db and recipient
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Scout sends an invite to a Prospect
custom_expected:
THEN the database captures all the data correctly
AND the Prospect receives the invite
AND the email includes a link to sign up for DP

title: Central Office sends invite: db and recipient
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Central Office sends an invite to a Prospect
custom_expected:
THEN the database captures all the data correctly
AND the Prospect receives the invite
AND the email includes a link to sign up for DP

title: Prospect receives invite
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Prospect has received his first invite
custom_expected:
THEN the invite reads:
Create a MLB Draft Prospect Link account to provide interested MLB Clubs with your information. 
Already have a MLB Draft Prospect Account Link account? Log in here.

NOTE: Change "a MLB" to "an MLB" twice

title: Invite link allows signup
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Prospect receives an invite
AND the invite email includes a link to sign up at DP
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects to Draft Prospect site
AND the landing page is a signup page.

title: Invite sender notified of signup
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user sent an invite to a Prospect
custom_steps: WHEN Prospect uses the link in the invite to sign up at Draft Prospects
custom_expected: THEN the sender of the invite is notified that the Prospect signed up.

title: System captures invite data
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has sent an invite to a Prospect
custom_expected:
THEN system captures the following data:
organization ID of inviter
date invitation was emailed
time invitation was emailed
linkID
date Prospect clicks link
time Prospect clicks link
date Prospect signs up to DP
time Prospect signs up to DP

title: QUESTIONS: System keeps list of interested Clubs
custom_preconds: GIVEN that more than one Club has tried to invite a Prospect? Or is there another way to express interest?
custom_expected:
THEN DP system expands the list of interested Clubs for a Prospect
AND DP system stops expanding the list after Prospect signs up (to team? to DP?)
OR DP system stops expanding the list after Prospect opts out
AND no other scenario stops the system from expanding the list.

title: Scout views invites
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Scout is viewing Prospects who received invites
custom_expected:
THEN Scout views all Prospects invited by Scout's own Club
AND Scout can view all Prospects invited by Central Office.

title: Central Office views invites
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Central Office is viewing Prospects who received invites
custom_expected:
THEN Central Office can view all Prospects invited by Central Office
AND Central Office can view all Prospects invited by all Clubs.

title: First Club, then Central Office, invites Prospect
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Scout sent an invite to a Prospect
AND Central Office subsequently sent an invite to the same Prospect
custom_expected:
THEN invite appears to users in Scout's Club as originating from Club
AND invite appears to all other users as originating from Central Office.

title: Scout searches invites by name
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Scout is viewing Prospects who received invites
custom_expected: THEN Scout can search Prospects by name

title: Central Office searches invites by name
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Central Office is viewing Prospects who received invites
custom_expected: THEN Central Office can search Prospects by name.

title: Add Invite - appearance
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the Add Invite screen
custom_expected:
THEN screen displays 4 main elements: image, chart, Send button, + button
AND the image is a document in a red envelope connected by a dotted line to a group of devices
AND the chart has a row with fields prompts
AND the chart has 10 other rows with alternating light blue fill
AND the Send button is a dark blue lozenge with round corners
AND the Send button's white label reads: Send Invitation(s)
AND the + button is a white icon on a blue circle
AND all elements except the + button are horizontally centered on the screen
AND the + button is in the bottom right corner

title: Add Invite - chart rows numbered
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is adding an invite
custom_expected:
THEN the chart rows are numbered
AND the numbers are white labels on green circles to the left of the chart
AND 10 rows appear until user chooses to add more.

title: Add Invite - chart column headers
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is adding an invite
custom_expected:
THEN the chart column headers are:
First Name*
Last Name*
Email Address*
Draft Year 
School State
School Name
Parent's Email Address(es)

title: Add Invite - required fields
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is adding an invite
custom_expected:
THEN the required fields are:
first name
last name
Prospect's email address

title: Add Invite - field prompts
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is adding an invite
custom_expected:
THEN the first row in the chart contains field prompts in gray as follows:
Field: Prompt
First Name: Click to Add
Last Name: Click to Add
Email Address: Click to Add
Draft Year: -YYYY+
School State: Click
School Name: Click to Add
Parent's Email Address(es): Separate With ","

AND the last row contains a field prompt: Other Email Address(es)

title: Add Invite - enable Send button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Add Invite screen
AND user has not entered any names yet
AND Send button is disabled
custom_steps: WHEN user enters all the required information for one Prospect
custom_expected: THEN the Send button is enabled.

title: Add Invite - dupe email warning
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is adding an invite
custom_steps: WHEN user enters an email address that has already received an invite
custom_expected:
THEN a warning icon appears next to the email address field
AND the warning icon is a brown exclamation mark inside a triangle with a brown border
AND a brown popup box with rounded corners appears over the column header
AND the popup is horizontally centered above the warning icon
AND the popup contains a message in white
AND the message reads:
An invitation from your Club has already been sent to this email address.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19533)

title: Add Invite - Draft Year dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is adding an invite
AND Draft Year field is a stepper
AND a year appears in the stepper
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the + icon
custom_expected:
THEN stepper cycles through 3 years in addition to the year currently displayed (e.g., 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022)
AND stepper buttons change color when clicked

title: Add Invite - School State dropdown
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is adding an invite
custom_steps: WHEN user starts typing in the School State field
custom_expected: THEN pre-populated date appears as a type-ahead.

title: Add Invite - School Name dropdown
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is adding an invite
custom_steps: WHEN user types in the School Name field
custom_expected:
THEN pre-populated data appears as a type-ahead
AND data is formatted: Name - City
AND data is pre-filtered by School State.

title: Add Invite - School data from eBIS
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is creating an invite
AND school state is requested
AND school name is requested
custom_expected:
THEN system pre-populates state and name in type-ahead list
AND system pulls this data from eBIS

title: Add Invite - parent's email validation
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is adding an invite
custom_steps: WHEN user enters multiple email addresses for parents
custom_expected: THEN there is validation for commas between the email addresses

title: Add Invite - add more rows
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is adding an invite
AND user has added 10 Prospects to the invite chart
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the + button in the lower right corner
custom_expected:
THEN a field appears for user to enter a number of rows to add
AND prompt reads "Number of Rows to Add"

AND WHEN user enters a number and selects Add
THEN chart adds the selected number of rows.

title: Add Invite - Send invitations
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is adding an invite
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the Send Invitations button
AND for all invitees, the First Name, Last Name, Email Address fields have been completed
custom_expected:
THEN invite emails are sent to all Prospects in the chart
AND database captures all the data correctly.

title: Add Invite - success message - one Prospect
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is sending an invite to one Prospect
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps the Send button
custom_expected:
THEN a success message appears
AND the message reads: 
Invitation Sent 
Your invitation has been successfully sent out to a single prospect.

title: Add Invite - success message - multiple Prospects
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is sending invites to multiple Prospects
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps the Send button
custom_expected:
THEN a success message appears
AND the message reads:
Invitations Sent 
Your invitations have been successfully sent out to multiple prospects.

title: Scout assigns task to Prospect
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Scout is viewing a Prospect
custom_expected:
THEN Scout can assign a task to that Prospect
AND Scout can choose a deadline for completion of the task
AND Prospect receives notification of the task and deadline.

title: QUESTION: Can Scout send an email to a Prospect?
QUESTION: Can Scout send an email to multiple Prospects?
